welcome_message_body: "Welcome to charming Tipp City! Known for its small-town charm and friendly atmosphere, we invite you to explore our quaint shops, delicious cuisine, and rich history. Enjoy your stay!"

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Dayton-Wright Brothers Airport offers a variety of amenities and services for travelers.

wifi.note: Passengers can enjoy free WiFi throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at James Cox Dayton International Airport serves all domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Concourse A
terminals.description: Concourse A at James Cox Dayton International Airport serves primarily domestic flights.

terminals.name: Concourse B
terminals.description: Concourse B at James Cox Dayton International Airport serves both domestic and international flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.
